scripts.name: Bubble Breathing
scripts.description: Breathe slowly like you're blowing gentle bubbles

steps.text: Let's breathe like we're blowing bubbles. Get ready!
Take a slow breath in through your nose... 1, 2, 3
Now blow out slowly like you're making a big bubble... 1, 2, 3, 4
Great! Let's do it again. Breathe in... 1, 2, 3
And blow your bubble out... 1, 2, 3, 4
One more time! Breathe in... 1, 2, 3
And blow out your biggest bubble... 1, 2, 3, 4
Wonderful! You made such great bubbles!

scripts.name: Wall Pushes
scripts.description: Push against a wall to use your strong muscles

steps.text: Let's use our strong muscles! Find a wall you can push.
Put both hands flat on the wall, like you're going to push it.
Now push as hard as you can! Count to 5. Ready?
Take a breath. Great work!
Let's try again. Push hard! 1... 2... 3... 4... 5!
Awesome! You used your muscles really well!

scripts.name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
scripts.description: Notice things around you to feel more present

steps.text: Let's look around and notice things. This will help you feel better.
First, find 5 things you can see. Look around slowly.
Good! Now find 4 things you can touch. What do they feel like?
Nice! Now find 3 things you can hear. Listen carefully.
Great! Now find 2 things you can smell. Take a sniff.
Last one! Find 1 thing you can taste. Maybe your mouth or a drink.
You did it! You're right here, right now. Well done!

scripts.name: Gentle Stretch
scripts.description: Slow, easy stretches to relax your body

steps.text: Let's do some gentle stretches to help your body feel better.
Reach your arms up high like you're touching the sky!
Now slowly bend to one side, like a tree in the wind.
Come back to center and bend to the other side.
Great! Now roll your shoulders back slowly, one at a time.
Shake out your hands like you're shaking off water!
Take a deep breath and relax. You did wonderfully!
Let's count slowly together. This helps calm big feelings.
Take a breath and let's count. 1... 2... 3...
Keep going slowly. 4... 5... 6...
Almost there! 7... 8... 9...
And... 10! You did it!
Great job counting slowly. How do you feel now?
